entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022
